Partnership content: Yana ɗaukar mutum ɗaya don samun hangen nesa. yana ɗaukar ƙari don tabbatar da gaskiya. mika hannu yau, don ku kawo murmushi a fuskar wani.
About us content: BigSolve kungiya ce mara riba wacce ke neman tasiri rayuwa ta hanyar haɗin gwiwa. Dangane da SDG 17, manufarmu ce mu tara alumai masu daraja da mutunci waɗanda suka sadaukar da kansu don cimma manufofin ci gaba mai dorewa na Majalisar Dinkin Duniya. Mun samar da wata hanya, da za ta ba mu damar isa ga masu bukatar tallafi da jagora. Muna ci gaba da wannan manufa ta hanyar ilimi, shawarwari da haɗin gwiwa tare da wasu waɗanda ke raba waɗannan dabi'u
About us content1: Mun yi imanin cewa yayin da duniyarmu ke fuskantar ƙalubale da yawa, akwai kuma fatan samun sauyi idan muka yi aiki tare tare da haɗin gwiwa.
About us content2: Manufarmu mai sauƙi ce: Don gina al'umma mai ƙarfi inda kowane mutum zai iya rayuwa cikin farin ciki tare da mutunci da manufa ta hanyar haɗin gwiwa.
donor content: Ayyukan alheri mafi sauƙi suna yin babban bambanci. Komai kankantarsa, akwai ruhin da yake buqatarsa.
volunteer content: Kuna son yin canji amma ba ku da tabbacin daga ina za ku fara? Ko wataƙila, kuna da himma da ƙwarewa don canji amma kuna buƙatar dandamali.
